description: For a rich green curry, loaded with noodles and veg, flaked salmon, chilli and fragrant Thai basil, look no further than this simple and delicious recipe.
name: Simple Thai Green Curry With Salmon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
2 bunches broccolini, ends trimmed, halved crossways

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan with a lid over medium heat. Add salmon and cook for 5 minutes, turning halfway through cooking. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
Add curry paste and stir fry for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add milk and bamboo shoots, then stir to combine. Add broccolini, then cover and cook for 5 minutes or until broccolini is tender.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to packet instructions.
Flake salmon into large chunks, then add to curry mixture. Toss through noodles and serve topped with sprouts, basil and chilli.
